name: La Gianna Havana - Maduro - Toro
additionalNotes: Danli has been a tobacco source and cigar manufacturing region since 1765, when the Spanish crown established a royal tobacco trading post. La Gianna Havana, by United Cigars, was first introduced over 20 years ago in honor of the birth of David Garofalo's daughter, Gianna.  This cigar is available in two different blends, one Connecticut Shade Grown over Honduran binders and fillers; as well as a Maduro wrapper over Honduran binders and fillers.
